definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)

pinyin: jia3 zhuang4 xian4 gong1 neng2 kang4 jin4

sentences.english: The white half moon at the beginning of the nail is an indicator of good thyroid health.
sentences.chinese: 在指甲底端的白色半月形，是一個甲狀腺健康的指標。
甲狀腺功能減退是可以通過藥物治療好的。

sentences.english: Residents of the U. S. do not need to take iodine pills to prevent radiation-induced thyroid cancer.
sentences.chinese: 美國居民無須服用碘片來預防輻射造成的甲狀腺癌症。

sentences.english: Objective To analysis of thyroid surgery aftercare and observation methods and significance.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析研究甲狀腺手術後護理與觀察的方法和意義。

sentences.english: Objective To explore diagnosis and countermeasure of tracheomalacia in thyroidectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討甲狀腺切除術中氣管軟化的診斷及對策。

sentences.english: The pills flood the thyroid gland with non-radioactive iodine.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥片可以使甲狀腺充滿非放射性碘。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the therapeutic effect of sclerema neonatorum with thyroxine.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察甲狀腺素治療新生兒硬腫症的療效。

sentences.english: Older patients are twice as likely to be diagnosed with thyroid cancer as younger patients.
sentences.chinese: 老年患者被診斷爲甲狀腺癌的風險是年輕患者的兩倍。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the recurrent reasons about tubercular goiters after operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲探討結節性甲狀腺腫術後復發的原因。

sentences.english: Seafood also contains iodine, which is good for your thyroids.
sentences.chinese: 食用海鮮還可以補充對甲狀腺有益的碘元素。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the operative technique and feasibility of endoscopic thyroidectomy by anterior thoracic approach.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腔鏡下甲狀腺切除術的方法以及可行性。

sentences.english: Objective To approach the protection of camera anterior bulbi to thyroid homograft .
sentences.chinese: 目的論證眼前房對同種甲狀腺移植物有保護作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence factors influencing thyroid volume in school children in iodine-deficient region.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討缺碘地區學齡兒童甲狀腺容積的影響因素。

sentences.english: Hyperthyroidism is more frequent in females than males.
sentences.chinese: 甲狀腺機能亢進以女性較常見。

sentences.english: Chronic autoimmune thyroiditis was a main cause of primary hypothyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 慢性自身免疫性甲狀腺炎是原發甲減的主要原因。

sentences.english: Calciphylaxis is becoming increasingly common in patients with normal renal and parathyroid function.
sentences.chinese: 鈣過敏症越來越常見於腎和甲狀腺功能正常的患者。
